text: Bholari railway station (, , Sindhi: ٻولهاڙي ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located in Bholari village, Thatta district of Sindh province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Thatta District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Bholari railway station
